import React, { useState } from 'react' import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion' const projects = [ { id: 3, name: 'FORGOTTEN LORE', image: '/images/forgottenlore.png', type: '3D', description: '"Forgotten Lore", my Final Group Project at SAE Institute Germany.', additionalImages: ['/images/forgottenlore_2.png', '/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg'], originalPostUrl: 'https://example.com/project3' }, { id: 1, name: 'PROJECT BLASTZXNE 2', image: '/images/blastzone2.png', type: 'GRAPHIC', description: 'A vampire survival like with simple Geometry, 2 week Game Jam.', additionalImages: ['/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg'], originalPostUrl: 'https://pixum.itch.io/blastzone2' }, { id: 2, name: 'PROJECT ERYTHEA', image: '/placeholder.svg', type: 'UI', description: 'A sleek user interface design for a space exploration game.', additionalImages: ['/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg'], originalPostUrl: 'https://example.com/project2' }, { id: 4, name: 'OLD TV', image: '/placeholder.svg', type: '3D', description: 'A game ready Asset of an old TV in a Cabin.', additionalImages: ['/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg'], originalPostUrl: 'https://example.com/project4' }, { id: 5, name: 'UI DESIGN CONCEPT', image: '/placeholder.svg', type: 'UI', description: 'A modern and intuitive user interface design for a productivity app.', additionalImages: ['/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg', '/placeholder.svg'], originalPostUrl: 'https://example.com/project5' } ] export default function Portfolio() { const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState('home') const pageVariants = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, in: { opacity: 1, y: 0 }, out: { opacity: 0, y: -20 } } const pageTransition = { type: 'tween', ease: 'anticipate', duration: 0.5 } return (
setCurrentPage('home')}>

Dylan Weber

  • setCurrentPage('connect')} className="hover:text-white transition-colors">Connect
{currentPage === 'home' && (

I'm Dylan Weber

)} {currentPage === 'about' && (

About Me

3D Artist and Graphic Designer with a passion to create high quality products.

Hello! I'm Dylan Weber, a passionate 3D Artist and Graphic Designer based in Bochum. I focus on creating high-quality assets and experiences for games and interactive media.

My journey into the world of digital art began with personal projects and collaborations in Game Jams and small, focused projects with friends. Currently, I'm working on the User Interface for an upcoming strategy game, continuing to develop my skills and push the boundaries of what I can create.

When I'm not crafting digital worlds, I enjoy gaming. It's more than just a hobby â€” it inspires me, fuels my creativity, and brings a fresh perspective to the projects I work on.

)} {currentPage === 'connect' && (

Let's Connect

I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations

{ e.preventDefault(); alert('Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.'); }}>

Get in Touch

Whether you have a project in mind or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out! I'm excited to hear from you and discuss how we can work together.

) }
